meanings.definition: Skillful in underhanded or evil schemes; cunning; deceitful.
meanings.sent1: The crafty fox tricked the other animals into giving him all the food.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was being crafty when he kept changing his story.
meanings.sent3: The crafty villain thought he could outsmart everyone, but justice caught up with him.
meanings.sent4: Her crafty plan to sneak past the guards worked like a charm.
meanings.sent5: The crafty magician amazed the audience with his illusions.

meanings.definition: Skillful in using one's hands or mind; clever; resourceful.
meanings.sent1: The crafty inventor came up with a new gadget that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She showed her crafty skills by creating a beautiful piece of art from recycled materials.
meanings.sent3: The crafty student found a clever way to solve the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent4: His crafty mind was always inventing new ways to improve everyday tasks.
meanings.sent5: The crafty chef could turn simple ingredients into gourmet dishes.
